name: OUTRANGE
description:
This is small tower defense game. You must protect circle from enemies.

The aim of game - get max score.

Press arrow keys, to rotate circle and towers. Press space, for add turret on the right part of circle.

Link to Ludum Dare page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=1862

All design was made by Anton Akhatov. Please visit his site: https://gcor.ru/
